oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Link trainer built by Oak Ridge boys
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One boy sits in the cockpit and four other boys stand next to a model airplane with an illustration "The Atom" on one side.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boys; Model airplanes; Teenagers
Dolan, Dan; Koth, Donald; Lister, Joe; Nagle, Steven; Wright, Winter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of August 23, 1945. From left to right: Joe Lister, Steven Nagle, Winter Wright, Donald Koth and Dan Dolan seated in the cockpit.
